cab.content: (THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'8 GOVERNMENT)SECRET COPY NO.C---g.'.(.L!-7) 6528th February, 19U7.CABINETUNIVERSITIES committee note by the Secretary of the CabinetThe Prime Minister has appointed a Committee withthe following terms of reference"To keep under review Government policy in respectof the Universities and the relation between"the Universities and the rest of the nationaleducational system.112. The membership of the Committee is as follows:-Chancellor of the Exchequer (Chairman)Lord President of the CouncilSecretary of State for Dominion affairs secretary of State for ScotlandMinister of EducationSecretary for Overseas TradeParliamentary Secretary, Ministry of Works.3- The Committee will be served by an official committee consisting of representatives of the following departments:-TreasuryOffice of the Lord PresidentScottish office ministry of education ministry of Labour and National Servicetogether with the Chairman of the University Grants Committee.U. The Secretary of the Committee will beMr. D.F.H. Rickett, Cabinet Office.(Signed) NORMAN brook cabinet Office, S.W.1.,,28th February, 19h7.
